subject: Batch 2: Add metadata to 8 SKILL.md files (with YAML frontmatter)
description:
Add `metadata` field to the YAML frontmatter of the following 8 SKILL.md files. Each file has existing `---` delimited YAML frontmatter.

For each file:
1. Read the file
2. Check if `metadata` field already exists -- if so, skip
3. Find the closing `---` of the frontmatter and replace it with:
```
metadata:
  author: masaaki-nagasawa
  version: 1.0.0
---
```
4. Do NOT change any other content

SPECIAL: lottery-automation has `allowed-tools` in its frontmatter. Add metadata AFTER allowed-tools but BEFORE the closing `---`.

Files to process:
1. /Users/masaaki_nagasawa/.claude/skills/full-ui-test/SKILL.md
2. /Users/masaaki_nagasawa/.claude/skills/lottery-automation/SKILL.md (has allowed-tools, add metadata after it)
3. /Users/masaaki_nagasawa/.claude/skills/new-docker-project/SKILL.md
4. /Users/masaaki_nagasawa/.claude/skills/notification-alert/SKILL.md
5. /Users/masaaki_nagasawa/.claude/skills/playwright-browser-automation/SKILL.md
6. /Users/masaaki_nagasawa/.claude/skills/process-state-management/SKILL.md
7. /Users/masaaki_nagasawa/.claude/skills/refactoring-guide/SKILL.md
8. /Users/masaaki_nagasawa/.claude/skills/sales-analysis/SKILL.md

Report each file processed with success/skip/error status.
activeForm: Adding metadata to batch 2 SKILL.md files
